item.ptxt: When performing the following procedure, be sure to observe Precautions for Fuel System Service:J24B to reduce the risk of fire and personal injury.
Put injector and battery as far away as possible to reduce risk of fire and personal injury when connecting/disconnecting test harness to/from battery.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect fuel feed hose from delivery pipe.

s2.ptxt: Fit washer (1) (inside diameter 13.5 – 14.5 mm (0.531 – 0.570 in.)) to injector (2), and then install injector to special tool (A).
Install special tool (B) to special tool (A).
Connect fuel feed hose to special tool (A).

s1.ptxt: Install suitable vinyl tube onto injector nozzle to prevent fuel from splashing out when injecting.
Connect one of terminal of special tool (c) to battery positive (+) terminal.
Operate fuel pump and apply fuel pressure to injector as follows:

s2.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC (1) with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ignition switch to ON position, clear DTC and select “ACTIVE TEST” mode on scan tool.
Turn on fuel pump using scan tool.
Remove fuel pump relay from connector.
Connect two terminals of relay connector using service wire (1) as shown in figure.

attention2.ptxt: Check that connection is made between correct terminals. Wrong connection can cause damage to ECM, wire harness, etc.

s2.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position.

s1.ptxt: Apply battery voltage to injector (1) for 15 seconds and measure injected fuel volume with graduated cylinder. Test each injector two or three times. If injected volume is out of reference value greatly, replace injector.
Check fuel leakage from injector nozzle. Do not operate injector for this check (but fuel pump should be at work). If fuel leaks (1) more than the following specifications, replace.
Remove injector from special tool (A) and disconnect special tool (C) from injector.

attention1.ptxt: As fuel feed line is still under high fuel pressure even after inspection, removing injector directly may cause dangerous spout of fuel. Before removing injector, make sure to relieve fuel pressure as follows.

item.ptxt: Apply battery voltage to injector until no fuel is injected from injector.

s1.ptxt: Carry out Steps 3) through 10) on each injector to obtain four readings.
After checking, remove special tools from fuel injector and fuel feed hose.
Connect fuel feed hose to fuel delivery pipe.
Install fuel injectors to cylinder head.
